newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Daily Variety - June 12.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Daily Variety - June 12.

text.p: The following stories appeared in Thursday's Daily Variety:
* News Corp Ltd sold its satellite interests to PrimeStar Partners for $1.1 billion.
* News Corp also acquired International Family Entertainment, the parent of the Family Channel, for $1.9 billion.
* U S West sold its shareholdings in Time Warner, getting $50 a share for its 4.4 million shares.
* Steve Martin and Eddie Murphy are expected to work together on the comedy, "Bofinger," for director Frank Oz and Imagine Entertainment.
* Regal Cinemas Inc is looking to acquire the 643-screen Cobb Theatres of Birmingham, Ala., a deal estimated at aout $200 million that could close within 60 days.
